balloon.content: This shade really brings out your features!
I can't wait to see the final look!

left.balloon: Cette teinte met vraiment en valeur vos traits !

right.balloon: J’ai hâte de voir le look final !

balloon.content: Alright team, let's get ready to roll!
Just tell me when you need me!

left.balloon: D'accord équipe, préparons-nous à y aller !

right.balloon: Dites-moi juste quand vous avez besoin de moi !

balloon.content: Okay, buddy, time to show them what you’ve got!
I hope this goes smoothly

left.balloon: D'accord, mon pote, il est temps de leur montrer ce que tu as !

right.balloon: J'espère que ça se passera bien.

balloon.content: Here we go, unleash the magic!
I’m on my mark!
I’m outta here!

panel.below: On the left is a vicious dog
On the left is a vicious dog

balloon.content: CUT! That was not supposed to happen!
Why is it chasing me?!

left.balloon: COUPE ! Ça n'était pas censé se passer comme ça !

balloon.content: This ride just made my day!

left.balloon: Cette attraction a vraiment égayé ma journée !

balloon.content: I'll have a cheeseburger, please!
I hope they have my favorite!

left.balloon: Je prendrai un cheeseburger, s'il vous plaît !

balloon.content: Here you go, just take my card

panel.below: In the middle is the parked motorbike

balloon.content: Got it, one cheeseburger coming right up!

panel.below: In the middle is the parked motorbike
In the middle is the parked motorbike

right.balloon: Compris, un cheeseburger arrive tout de suite !

panel.below: In the middle is the parked motorbike

balloon.content: Mmm, this is delicious! Glad I stopped!

panel.below: In the middle is the parked motorbike

balloon.content: Enjoy your meal; it’s huge!

panel.below: In the middle is the parked motorbike

left.balloon: Mmm, c'est délicieux ! Content que je me sois arrêté !

panel.below: In the middle is the parked motorbike

right.balloon: Profitez de votre repas ; il est énorme !

panel.below: In the middle is the parked motorbike

balloon.content: eating the burger
I can’t believe I just did that..

right.balloon: Je n'arrive pas à croire que je viens de faire ça..
